This page contains materials by [David Benkeser](https://davidbphd.com/) and [Julia Wrobel](http://juliawrobel.com/) for the short course titled "The HitchHikers Guide to Reproducible Research", developed for the 2024 Summer Institute in Statistics and Modeling in Infections Diseases (SISMID).
